snippet: Knicks Coach Mike D’Antoni spoke up for Jared Jeffries, and Jeffries for D’Antoni.
abstract: Knicks Coach Mike D’Antoni spoke up for Jared Jeffries, and Jeffries for D’Antoni.
lead_paragraph: Anyone who plays or coaches at Madison Square Garden is eventually inoculated against the boos and the taunts, building up a steady resistance to the crowd’s emotional whims. It is an accepted part of playing in New York, one that is rarely questioned.
